constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 69 (Wednesday, April 27, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MULLIN:
H.R. 7604.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Constitutional authority on which this bill is based is
Congress's power under the Commerce Clause in Article I,
Section 8, of the Constitution and under the Constitution's
grant of powers to Congress under the Equal Protection, Due
Process, and Enforcement Clauses of the Fourteenth Amendment.
[Page H4575]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: Partial Birth Abortion Is Murder Act
